Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.client

Interface ClientAction

All Known Implementing Classes:
Flow, RmiClient, SocketClient
public interface ClientAction
This class represents the actions that a client can perform within the game.

    • createGame

      void createGame(String nickname) throws IOException, InterruptedException, NotBoundException
      The client can create a new game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the client.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurs during action processing.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted, either before or during the action.
      NotBoundException - If a name in the registry was not found.

    • placeStarterOnCodex

      void placeStarterOnCodex(Player player, Side side) throws IOException, InterruptedException, Exception
      The client can place the Starter card in the Codex.
      Parameters:
      player - The player representing the client.
      side - The side of the Starter card to be placed into the Codex.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurs during action processing.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted, either before or during the action.
      Exception - If an abnormal condition has occurred during the execution of the action.

    • placeCardOnCodex

      void placeCardOnCodex(Player player, int index, boolean frontCard, int row, int col) throws IOException, InterruptedException, Exception
      The client can place a card in the Codex.
      Parameters:
      player - The player representing the client.
      index - The index of the card in the player's hand to be placed.
      frontCard - A boolean indicating whether to place the front (true) or back (false) side of the card.
      row - The row in the Codex where the card is to be placed.
      col - The column in the Codex where the card is to be placed.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurs during action processing.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted, either before or during the action.
      Exception - If an abnormal condition has occurred during the execution of the action.

    • selectCardObjective

      void selectCardObjective(Player player, int cardObjective) throws IOException, InterruptedException, Exception
      The client can select his personal Objective card.
      Parameters:
      player - The player representing the client.
      cardObjective - The index of the card in the player's list of Objective cards that the player wishes to select.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurs during action processing.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted, either before or during the action.
      Exception - If an abnormal condition has occurred during the execution of the action.

    • drawCardFromDeck

      void drawCardFromDeck(Player player, DeckType deck) throws IOException, InterruptedException, Exception
      The client can draw a card from the deck of cards.
      Parameters:
      player - The player representing the client.
      deck - The deck from which the card is drawn.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurs during action processing.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted, either before or during the action.
      Exception - If an abnormal condition has occurred during the execution of the action.

    • drawCardDisplayed

      void drawCardDisplayed(Player player, DeckType deck, int index) throws IOException, InterruptedException, Exception
      The client can draw a card from the visible cards.
      Parameters:
      player - The player representing the client.
      deck - The visible deck from which the card is drawn.
      index - The index of the card in the displayed deck that the player wishes to draw.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurs during action processing.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted, either before or during the action.
      Exception - If an abnormal condition has occurred during the execution of the action.

      void gameSizeUpdated(int size) throws RemoteException, Exception
      The client can choose the number of players participating in the game.
      Parameters:
      size - The number of players participating in the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs in remote communication.
      Exception - If an abnormal condition has occurred during the execution of the action.
